name: Daikaiju
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 33 jam. http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Gareth Williams (@garethiw): Code, code and more code
Paul Yendley (@gredgie): All the arts
Carl Hughes (@devilqube): Additional code and sfx foley work
Shaun Reed (@shaunjmr): Original soundtrack \m/

Includes an online leaderboard.

Cursors/Joypad stick - Movement
Space/Joypad A - Jump
C/Joypad X - Pick Up / Throw
V/Joypad RT - Breathe Fire
B/Joypad Y - Climb Building
